kiTab.desckiControl: Permits the use of Dominion techniques.
kiTab.desckiDetection: Allows for the Detection the energy of beings in the surrounding area, however, the form, size or intensity cannot be determined. [Ability = (Notice + MK total) / 2]
kiTab.desckiErudition: As Detection, but allows to determine the form, size, type, intensity, and strength of such sources. Also permits searching for Ki sources.
kiTab.desckiCombatAura: Your aura extends (Presence x 15)ft. It can cause fear, paralysis, & fainting. Automatically triggered when one is excited for combat or is accumulating for a technique. Mainiting it however costs 1 Ki per 5 turns.
kiTab.desckiPhysChange: You can slightly alter your appearance. Notice 280, Search 180, or Ki Detection 100 to notice. -80 To Hide your Ki when you keep the change.
kiTab.desckiSuperiorChange: As Physical Change, but you can change by 50% your size, and even take on nonhuman features.
kiTab.desckiMultBodies: As a full turn action, you create (POW / 3) copies. They have a -80 aam, and -4 to characteristics. They have no special abilities. They disappear when hit.
kiTab.desckiGreaterMult: As Multiplication of Bodies, but reduce the cost, and you can make POW copies.
kiTab.desckiArcaneMult: As Greater Multiplication of Bodies, but you may create POWx5 copies.
kiTab.desckiMagnitude: Investing 3 Ki per copy, reduce their penalties to -60 and -3.
kiTab.desckiArcaneMagn: Investing 6 Ki per copy, reduce their penalties to -20 and -1.
kiTab.desckiAgeControl: Quadruple your life expectancy, and halve old age penalties.
kiTab.desckiTechImi: With enough MK, you may learn any Ki technique you see, at reduced cost (-10 per Technique Level).
kiTab.desckiTechPush: Accumulating twice Ki for a technique: increased by 50% of the bonus / number of attacks, +1 multiple of damage (if any) and +40 to its Resistance difficulty.
kiTab.descweightElimination: Allows to partially ignore the effects of gravity for the full movement value per turn. The first turn is free, every other turn afterwards costs = 1 Ki / Turn.
kiTab.desckiLevitation: Allows flight with movement equivalent to 1/4 of your base movement, rounded up. The initial Ki cost is equal to the desired movement value, and to maintain it costs = 1 Ki / Minute
kiTab.desckiObjectMotion: Allows to project energy to touch and move objects over a distance. The object must be within the characters sight. The cost is 1 Ki per turn per 10lb.
kiTab.desckiMassMove: Allows for the movement of multiple objects through object motion and increases total affected weight per Ki point. The cost is 1 Ki per turn per 110lb
kiTab.desckiFlight: Permits flight at your full movement value. The Ki cost is equal to the desired movement value. Cost = 1 Ki / Minute.
kiTab.desckiPresenceEx: Allows to physically touch pure energy or intangible elements up to twice the users presence.
kiTab.desckiEnergyArmor: Add +2 to the Energy AT with no penalties for using additional layers of protection.
kiTab.desckiGreaterArmor: Allows to add an additional +2 to the Energy AT on top of Energy Armor base value while active. The cost is 1 Ki per 5 Turns.
kiTab.desckiArcaneArmor: Increases the base value of Energy Armor to +4, and additionally if activated, it increases the Energy Armor by another +2 (6 Ene AT Total). The cost is 1 Ki per 5 turns.
kiTab.desckiAuraEx: Extends the effects of Presence Extrusion to weapons granting it the ability to damage Energy. Additionally, increases the weapons final damage by 10, fortitude by 10, and breakage by 5.
kiTab.desckiEleFire: Gain heat as a secondary damage type, regardless of the weapon used. If the primary damage type is heat, increase the base damage by 10 instead.
kiTab.desckiEleWater: Gain cold as a secondary damage type, regardless of the weapon used. If the primary damage type is cold, increase the base damage by 10 instead.
kiTab.desckiEleAir: Gain electricity as a secondary damage type, regardless of the weapon used. If the primary damage type is electricity, increase the base damage by 10 instead.
kiTab.desckiEleEarth: Gain imp as a secondary damage type, regardless of the weapon used. If the primary damage type is imp, increase the base damage by 10 instead.
kiTab.desckiEleLight: Gain energy as a secondary damage type, regardless of the weapon used. If the primary damage type is energy, increase the base damage by 10 instead.
kiTab.desckiEleDark: Gain energy as a secondary damage type, regardless of the weapon used. If the primary damage type is energy, increase the base damage by 10 instead.
kiTab.desckiIncreaseDmg: +10 to Base Damage of all physical attacks, including Ki attacks and projectiles.
kiTab.desckiIncreaseReach: Double the reach on Area Attacks. (Total targets = Small 6, Medium 8, Large 10).
kiTab.desckiDestruction: Must be in physical contact with the object or living creature. The difficulty of the PhR check = [Presence + (5 per Ki used)] with a maximum of x2 Presence. Against an inorganic object, if it fails by more than 40 it is instantly destroyed or losses 5 quality. Against a living creature, they take damage based on the failure difference.
kiTab.desckiAbsorbtion: Allows to absorb 5 points of supernatural or energy damage per Ki point spent (this is a voluntary action, therefore, it must be declared when used).
kiTab.desckiPhysShield: Obtain a Damage Barrier equal to your Base Presence.
kiTab.desckiTrans: Ki points can be exchanged with an individual, at a rate of the lowest Accumulation.
kiTab.desckiHeal: Heals up to half of the damage suffered. 1 Ki for 2 LP. Physical contact necessary.
kiTab.desckiSupHeal: Heal up to half of the damage suffered. 1 Ki for 5 LP. Physical contact necessary.
kiTab.desckiStabil: For between 2 and 5 Ki points, stabilize another individual. Each additional 2 Ki points offers +5 to the PhR check.
kiTab.desckiLifeSac: Recover 1 Ki per 2 lifepoints sacrificed. Those lifepoints are recovered under the sacrificed lifepoints rules (10 per day).
kiTab.desckiUseOfEne: Multiply the time you can do an activity by 10x before you are tired. Also allows the use 5 Fatigue points at once
kiTab.desckiConceal: Hide your presence from Detection. [Ability = (MK total + Hide) / 2] -10 per Ki accumulated.
kiTab.desckiAuraConceal: Use Ki Concealment on others at -40 if there is contact, or -120 if within 10 feet of the target. -10 for each additional individual you hide. One roll is used to conceal everyone, including self.
kiTab.desckiFalseDeath: You go into a state of apparent death (although you remain aware). Medicine 280 check to find out that you're still alive. Need 1 full turn to recover.
kiTab.desckiEleminationOfNec: Eliminates physical needs, reducing the required food, water, and sleep by 1/10 of a normal person.
kiTab.desckiEleImmHeat: You may resist 5 Heat intensities, add +1 intensity immunity per ki spent, total cost must be maintained per turn.
kiTab.desckiEleImmCold: You may resist 5 Cold intensities, add +1 intensity immunity per ki spent, total cost must be maintained per turn.
kiTab.desckiEleImmEle: You may resist 5 Electricity intensities, add +1 intensity immunity per ki spent, total cost must be maintained per turn.
kiTab.desckiPenRed: Reduce by 1/2 the penalties from criticals and Fatigue, unless the critical is caused by amputation, magic, or psychic abilities.
kiTab.desckiRecovery: Recover 1 point of Fatigue per 5 Ki (only 1 fatigue point may be recovered per turn).
kiTab.desckiRestoreOther: Touching another person recovers 1 point of Fatigue for them for 5 ki (only 1 fatigue recovery per turn).
kiTab.desckiCharacAug: Raise a characteristic by up to 3 points. The initial cost equals the final value of the augmented characteristic. Maintanence Cost = 1 Ki / Turn.
kiTab.desckiSupCharacAug: Raise a characteristic by up to 4 points. The initial cost equals the final value of the augmented characteristic. Maintenance Cost = 1 Ki / 10 Turns.
kiTab.desckiImpovTech: You may improvise techniques according to page 47 of Dominus Exxet.
kiTab.desckiInhumanity: Allows to perform inhuman actions (320 on die rolls), and raise physical characteristics above 11.
kiTab.desckiZen: Allows to perform zen actions (440 on die rolls), and raise physical characteristics above 13.
kiTab.descuseOfNemesis: This ability is the prerequisite necessary to be able to access the other Nemesis abilities.
kiTab.descnemiArmor: Reduces Base Damage suffered by 10 points, if the damage becomes 0, the attack does not cause any damage.
kiTab.descnemiNoht: Upgraded version of the armor of emptiness, reduce Base Damage by 30 points.
kiTab.descnemiKiCancel: Lowers the Ki Accumulation of people around you, including allies. Maintenance cost 2 ki per turn (aoe) or 5 ki per turn on a single target. (page 22/23 Table 10 & 11)
kiTab.descnemiGreaterKiCancel: Upgrades the Cancellation values to the Greater tab and increases the Maintenance cost to 5 ki per turn or 10 ki per turn on a single target.(page 22/23 Table 10 & 11)
kiTab.descnemiMysticCancel: Cancels out Magic in the area, either active or being cast if reduced below their base cost. Maintenance 2 ki per turn or 10 ki per turn for a single target.
kiTab.descnemiGreaterMysticCancel: Upgrades the Cancellation values to the Greater tab and increases the Maintenance cost to 5 ki per turn or 10 ki per turn on a single target.
kiTab.descnemiMatrixCancel: Cancels out Innate or Active Psychic powers if reduced bellow the powers base value. Maint 2 per turn or 10 per turn for a single target.
kiTab.descnemiGreaterMatrixCancel: Upgrades the Cancellation values to the Greater tab and increases the Maint. cost to 5 per turn or 10 per turn on a single target.
kiTab.descnemiBindCancel: Cancels the summoning, binding, banishing and control of NEW summons. Does not effect already summoned beings
kiTab.descnemiEmptyExt: Allows the user to attack and defend against Energy and Immaterial beings up to double the users presence. Sets primary damage to Energy and secondary to cold.
kiTab.descnemiFormOfEmpty: Allows the user to use a spectral form, can only be damaged or blocked by things that can damage energy. Passive activation cost 1 point and Maint. 1 Ki per 5 turn.
kiTab.descnemiBodyEmpty: +20 to all Resistances and can no longer suffer the effects of bleeding.
kiTab.descnemiNoNeeds: Removes all physical needs, however a character with psychological addictions such as food or dreaming or something similar will need to indulge in those or suffer exhaustion
kiTab.descnemiMoveEmpty: Allows the user to move according to his POW. This ability allows movement above 10 without Inhuman or Zen. In addition he no longer suffers penalty -80 to stealth for running
kiTab.descnemiEssenceEmpty: The user no longer suffers penalties from pain and fatigue, does not suffer the effect of criticals that do not cause true physical deficiencies, such as amputations.
kiTab.descnemiOneNothing: Annuls all criticals instantly, can suffer any amount of physical damage. Regrow lost limbs of pure energy. Doesnâ€™t work against, magic, psychic, Ars Magnus or Legacies of blood.
kiTab.descnemiAuraEmpty: Any living being in users presence must pass a PhR of (User Presence x2) or suffer -20 to all actions. Size according to POW.
kiTab.descnemiUndetectable: Applies a bonus of (User Presence x2) to MR, PsR against super natural detection. Ki users apply a similar (User Presence x2) penalty to their Ki detection against the user.
kiTab.descnemiInhumanity: You may reach 320 on die rolls, and use the full extent of what his Characteristics allow.
kiTab.descnemiZen: Allows rolls to go over 440 and there is no limit to a characters characteristics.

metaMagic.arcTip: Use mousewheel & shift+mousewheel to move around easily
metaMagic.mysticAccuDesc1: Attack spells gain precision (except area attack spells).
metaMagic.expAreaDesc1: May increase area of effect spells to be 50% larger.
metaMagic.expAreaDesc2: May increase area of effect spells to be 100% larger.
metaMagic.remProtectDesc1: Spend up to 20 additional zeon to reduce targets AT (1 AT per 10 zeon).
metaMagic.remProtectDesc2: Spend up to 40 additional zeon to reduce targets AT (1 AT per 10 zeon).
metaMagic.remProtectDesc3: Spend up to 60 additional zeon to reduce targets AT (1 AT per 10 zeon).
metaMagic.defExperDesc1: Spend up to 20 additional zeon to increase defensive magic projection by up to 20 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.defExperDesc2: Spend up to 40 additional zeon to increase defensive magic projection by up to 40 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.defExperDesc3: Spend up to 60 additional zeon to increase defensive magic projection by up to 60 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.offExperDesc1: Spend up to 20 additional zeon to increase offensive magic projection by up to 20 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.offExperDesc2: Spend up to 40 additional zeon to increase offensive magic projection by up to 40 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.offExperDesc3: Spend up to 60 additional zeon to increase offensive magic projection by up to 60 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.doubleDmgDesc: The base damage of all offensive spells is doubled.
metaMagic.secDefenseDesc: Magic shields function even on fumbles.
metaMagic.lifeMagicDesc1: Spells base healing is increased by 20/40/60/80.
metaMagic.lifeMagicDesc2: Spells base healing is increased by 40/80/120/160.
metaMagic.feelMagicDesc: Increase magic appraisal check to detect gifts or identify spells by 1.
metaMagic.hiddenMagicDesc: Halves penalties suffered to hide zeon accumulation; also, anyone identifying the user receives a -120 penalty to their magic appraisal.
metaMagic.spiritLoopDesc1: Can be maintained up to two turns (each turn consumes 100 zeon from the zeon pool).
metaMagic.spiritLoopDesc2: Can be maintained up to five turns (each turn consumes 100 zeon from the zeon pool).
metaMagic.controlSpaceDesc: Allows the selection of targets within offensive area of effect spells (10 zeon cost).
metaMagic.eneControlDesc: Spend 10 additional zeon on attack spells to make them capable of damaging energy; also 10 zeon can be spent on defensive spells to block energy attacks.
metaMagic.endureDamageDesc: Optionally, choose to take half of the damage received in zeon points and the other half in life points (only works against pure magic effects).
metaMagic.transferMagicDesc: Can transfer zeon from or to another person up to a distance equal to or less than their presence.
metaMagic.forceSpeed1: Spend up to 20 zeon to boost initiative by up to 20 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.forceSpeed2: Spend up to 40 zeon to boost initiative by up to 40 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.forceSpeed3: Spend up to 60 zeon to boost initiative by up to 60 (1 to 1).
metaMagic.doubleInnateDesc: Ability to cast two different innate spells per turn.
metaMagic.natMaintDesc: Spell maintance cost change. Turn maintanance cost is now every 5 turns, daily maintanance cost is now once a week (Pow/2 = amount of spells maintained with this abiltiy).
metaMagic.combinedMagicDesc: Ability to cast spells with other mages.
metaMagic.persisEffectDesc: Increases length between spiritual spells resistance checks from every 5 turns to every 10 turns.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc1: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc2: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120 || 20 for 120.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc3: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120 || 20 for 120 || 40 for 180.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc4: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120 || 20 for 120 || 40 for 180 || 60 for 240.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc5: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120 || 20 for 120 || 40 for 180 || 60 for 240 || 80 for 280.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc6: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120 || 20 for 120 || 40 for 180 || 60 for 240 || 80 for 280 || 100 for 320.
metaMagic.defMagProjDesc7: Choose to spend 10 zeon to cast a spell with the final ability of 120 || 20 for 120 || 40 for 180 || 60 for 240 || 80 for 280 || 100 for 320 || 200 for 440.
metaMagic.exploitEneDesc1: +25 to MA per fatigue point spent.
metaMagic.exploitEneDesc2: +40 to MA per fatigue point spent.
metaMagic.elevationDesc: Enter a state of spiritual elevation (halves time for zeon regeneration).
metaMagic.avatarDesc: Become a mass of pure supernatural energy (replace life points with zeon, and much more).
metaMagic.unlimitedZeonDesc: Every spell cast, return half of its zeon value to the zeon pool.
metaMagic.mysticConceDesc: Halves the withstand pain difficulty check to maintain the accumulated zeon.
metaMagic.spellSpec30Desc: Increases MA by +10 & Int by +1 for a specific spell (works on all spell difficulties). Maximum level of possible spells is 30.
metaMagic.spellSpec50Desc: Increases MA by +10 & Int by +1 for a specific spell (works on all spell difficulties). Maximum level of possible spells is 50.
metaMagic.spellSpec60Desc: Increases MA by +10 & Int by +1 for a specific spell (works on all spell difficulties). Maximum level of possible spells is 60.
metaMagic.spellSpec70Desc: Increases MA by +10 & Int by +1 for a specific spell (works on all spell difficulties). Maximum level of possible spells is 70.
metaMagic.spellSpec80Desc: Increases MA by +10 & Int by +1 for a specific spell (works on all spell difficulties). Maximum level of possible spells is 80.
metaMagic.pierceResDesc1: Increase MR check of spiritual spells by 5 every 50% damage achieved on the attack.
metaMagic.pierceResDesc2: Increase MR check of spiritual spells by 10 every 50% damage achieved on the attack.
metaMagic.bindSpellDesc: Ability to combine two spells together to create something new.
metaMagic.maxSpellsDesc: +1 to spellcasting ability for all spells.
metaMagic.doubleSpellDesc: Allows the ability to accumulate for 2 different spells simultaneously.
metaMagic.supInnateDesc: Allows the accumulation of zeon while casting innate spells.
metaMagic.highMagicDesc: Grants the ability to cast High Magic spells (drains twice as much zeon).

abfalter.name: Name
abfalter.title: Title
abfalter.basicDesc: Description of the basic spell effects
abfalter.intDesc: Description of the intermediate spell effects
abfalter.advDesc: Description of the advanced spell effects
abfalter.arcDesc: Description of the arcane spell effects
abfalter.head: Head
abfalter.confirmRemAtkPrompt: Are you sure you want to remove this attack?
abfalter.trapError: Must have a profile created under the weapon profile tab to use Trapping.
abfalter.confirmRemPrompt: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this item?
abfalter.rdyToFireDef: Ready to fire sets the base initiative of the weapon to 20.
abfalter.noProfilesfound: No profiles found, cannot open dialogue. Please add a profile to the weapon.
abfalter.noAmmoPrompt: This weapon has no ammo loaded, please load the weapon.
abfalter.ignoreLayerRules: Ignore 3 layer rules for AT calc. (added after all other calcs.)
abfalter.followLayerRules: Follow 3 layer rules for AT calc.
abfalter.confirmRemGiftPrompt: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this gift?
abfalter.accuKiReset: Are you sure you want to reset all Acquired Ki?
abfalter.multiClassError: Error: Multi-class calculations are not supported.
abfalter.dpTitleLabel: These DP offsets are only applied to the DP Calculator. They do not affect the DP or Presence on the actor sheet. Their only use is in case the GM grants specific DP to the player as a reward.

kiAbilityData.removeAbilityConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {name} ability?
kiAbilityData.warningTitle: Warning: Either the ki cost or maintenance cost is not fully set.
kiAbilityData.warningComb: Warning: The combinable ki cost is not fully set.
kiAbilityData.warningDisadv: Warning: There are too many disadvantages.
kiAbilityData.warningMk: Warning: The MK cost is either below or above its limits.
kiAbilityData.warningKi: Warning: The ki cost is not fully set.
kiAbilityData.warningMaint: Warning: The maintenance cost is not fully set.
kiAbilityData.fixWarningsContent: Warning: You are attempting to finalize the technique while certain values are missing. Do you want to continue?
kiAbilityData.createdWithWarnings: This user created & imported an incomplete ki technique with warnings.
kiAbilityData.attackAbilitySingleDesc: Adds a flatbonus to a single attack roll final value.
kiAbilityData.attackAbilityMultipleDesc: Adds a flat bonus to all attack rolls' final values for the turn.
kiAbilityData.predeterminedAttackDesc: This effect replaces the characters attack value to a predetermined final value.
kiAbilityData.counterattackAbilityDesc: This effect adds a bonus to a single counter-attack final value (only against the original attacker).
kiAbilityData.combatManeuversAimingSingleDesc: Adds a bonus to a single aimed attack lowering the precision penalty for the maneuver.
kiAbilityData.combatManeuversAimingMultipleDesc: This effect adds a bonus to all aimed attacks lowering the precision penalty for the maneuver for the turn.
kiAbilityData.indirectAttackDesc: The attack's source is not the character, making it impossible to counterattack directly. Defense still applies, but the enemy can't retaliate unless it's their turn.
kiAbilityData.camouflageAttackDesc: The attack disguises its true nature, requiring a Notice check to avoid being Surprised. After one successful check or prior exposure, the effect no longer works on the same target.
kiAbilityData.blockAbilitySingleDesc: Adds a flat bonus to a single block roll final value.
kiAbilityData.blockAbilityMultipleDesc: Adds a flat bonus to all block rolls' final values for the turn.
kiAbilityData.limitedBlockAbilityDesc: Adds a flat bonus to a single block roll final value, however, it prevents the character from counterattacking even if they succeed.
kiAbilityData.dodgeAbilitySingleDesc: Adds a flat bonus to a single dodge roll final value.
kiAbilityData.dodgeAbilityMultipleDesc: Adds a flat bonus to all dodge rolls' final values for the turn.
kiAbilityData.limitedDodgeAbilityDesc: Adds a flat bonus to a single dodge roll final value, however, it prevents the character from counterattacking even if they succeed.
kiAbilityData.predeterminedDefenseDesc: This effect replaces the characters defense value to a predetermined final value.
kiAbilityData.damageAugmentationSingleDesc: Increases the attack's base damage by a flat amount before the roll.
kiAbilityData.vitalSacrificeDesc: Spend Life Points to increase Base Damage by an equal amount (adjusted for Damage Resistance). Cannot use unnatural LP for this.
kiAbilityData.doubleVitalSacrificeDesc: Spend Life Points to increase Base Damage by double the amount (adjusted for Damage Resistance). Cannot use unnatural LP for this.
kiAbilityData.healthSacrificeDesc: Gain double the damage from LP sacrificed, but these LP cannot be recovered by any means.
kiAbilityData.characteristicSacrificeDesc: Increase Base Damage by +50 per Primary Characteristic point sacrificed (max 5, excludes Int/Perception). Lost stats are permanent.
kiAbilityData.limitedDamageDesc: Adds to Base Damage equal to the Life Points the user has lost (excluding unnatural LP). Cannot be used by creatures with Damage Resistance.
kiAbilityData.damageAugmentationMultipleDesc: Adds a flat bonus to the Base Damage of all attacks made during the turn.
kiAbilityData.damageMultiplierSingleDesc: Multiplies the attack's Base Damage before adding any flat bonuses. Only applies to one attack.
kiAbilityData.damageMultiplierMultipleDesc: Multiplies the attack's Base Damage before adding any flat bonuses. Applies to all attacks made during the turn.
kiAbilityData.predeterminedDamageSingleDesc: Replaces the weapon's normal Base Damage with a fixed value from the table for one attack.
kiAbilityData.predeterminedDamageMultipleDesc: Replaces the weapon's normal Base Damage with a fixed value from the table for all attacks made during the turn.
kiAbilityData.additionalAttacksDesc: Grants an extra attack without the usual multi-attack penalties. Effects of the Technique apply equally to both attacks.
kiAbilityData.continuousAttackDesc: All attacks are performed without interruption or counterattacks until the sequence ends.
kiAbilityData.addedFatigueBonusDesc: Any bonuses from spent Fatigue Points apply to all attacks made with the Technique.
kiAbilityData.comboUpToXDesc: Each extra attack must hit to continue the chain; a failed hit or defense ends the sequence. Reduces the Technique's Ki cost based on the number of chained attacks.
kiAbilityData.limitedAdditionalAttackDesc: Grants multiple penalty-free attacks, but Technique effects only apply to one chosen attack.
kiAbilityData.additionalDefensesDesc: Allows full defense rolls against multiple attacks without penalty, up to the number granted. Any beyond that follow standard penalties starting from the 2nd attack.
kiAbilityData.additionalActionsDesc: Lets the character perform multiple non-attack actions in a turn without penalties, but no action may be repeated.
kiAbilityData.initiativeAugmentationDesc: Increases the character's Initiative by a flat amount for the turn.
kiAbilityData.quickRecoveryDesc: Lets a character recover from being on the Defensive to act again in the same turn, unless they've suffered a Critical.
kiAbilityData.foretellDesc: Removes or reduces penalties from being Surprised due to Initiative differences. Only works if the character knows an attack is coming and doesn't protect against all surprise types.
kiAbilityData.longDistanceAttackSingleDesc: Allows the character to launch attacks at range, treating them as projectiles. Damage is either from a weapon or twice the user's Base Presence plus Power Bonus.
kiAbilityData.projectionDesc: The character travels with the attack, physically moving to the target's location along with the Technique.
kiAbilityData.trailOfDestructionDesc: The Technique hits all targets in a straight line from origin to final target; partial hits give +40 to defense.
kiAbilityData.longDistanceAttackMultipleDesc: All attacks during the turn are performed at range, but effects don't apply to attacks from other Techniques unless both are Combinable.
kiAbilityData.areaAttackSingleDesc: Hits all targets within a chosen radius using one attack roll. Damage is either from the weapon or twice Base Presence plus Power Bonus; specific targets cannot be excluded.
kiAbilityData.targetChoiceDesc: Allows the user to select specific known targets within an Area Attack instead of affecting everyone in the area.
kiAbilityData.areaAttackMultipleDesc: All attacks made during the turn affect a chosen area, hitting everyone inside unless another Technique is used without Combinable.
kiAbilityData.areaBlockDesc: Enables the user to Block large-scale or mass attacks (like fireballs or arrow volleys), but only works with Blockâ€”not Dodge.
kiAbilityData.automaticTransportationDesc: Teleports the user a set distance instantly or in steps, but cannot pass through solid objects. May be combined with attacks or defenses, but can't grant flank bonuses or be used as a passive action.
kiAbilityData.breakageAugmentationDesc: Increases a weapon's Breakage value, stacking with other modifiers like Quality or user strength.
kiAbilityData.fortitudeAugmentationDesc: Boosts the Fortitude of a weapon or armor, making it harder to break. This stacks with any other enhancements.
kiAbilityData.armorPenetrationDesc: Reduces the target's Armor Type (AT) based on the chosen reduction level. Ignores Armor causes the attack to bypass AT completely, or deal bonus damage if blocked by supernatural shields.
kiAbilityData.armorAugmentationDesc: Raises the user's Armor Type for a turn without initiative penalties and can stack with existing armor.
kiAbilityData.unmodifiableDesc: Armor granted by the Technique can't be ignored by weapons, abilities, or Techniquesâ€”only halved at most.
kiAbilityData.physicalArmorDesc: The Technique's armor gives no protection against Energy-based attacks.
kiAbilityData.slownessDesc: Each point of AT granted by the Technique reduces the user's Movement by 1 and Initiative by 5, but not below half Movement.
kiAbilityData.movementIncreaseDesc: Boosts Movement Value for a turn, but values above 13 only increase by 1 for every 2 bonus points. Can also be used to negate Area Attack penalties when Dodging.
kiAbilityData.abilityIncreaseDesc: Grants a bonus to a chosen Athletic or Vigor Secondary Ability. If the total would exceed 200, only half the excess is applied.
kiAbilityData.increasedBonusDesc: Adds a bonus to one chosen Characteristic, but only for opposed checks like Disarm or Trapping. It doesn't affect the base Characteristic itself.
kiAbilityData.physicalResistanceIncreaseDesc: Grants a temporary bonus to Physical Resistance (PhR) against all effects for the turn.
kiAbilityData.diseaseResistanceDesc: The bonus applies to Disease Resistance (DR) as well.
kiAbilityData.poisonResistanceDesc: The bonus applies to Poison Resistance (PsnR) as well.
kiAbilityData.magicalResistanceIncreaseDesc: Grants a temporary bonus to Magical Resistance (MR) against all effects for the turn.
kiAbilityData.psychicResistanceIncreaseDesc: Grants a temporary bonus to Psychic Resistance (PsyR) against all effects for the turn.
kiAbilityData.perceptiveAbilitiesDesc: Grants special perception-based effects (each listed separately in the full table). Multiple can be used together by paying each cost individually.
kiAbilityData.energyDamagingAttackDesc: Allows the attack to harm energy beings or effects. If the user can already damage energy, this adds +10 Base Damage.
kiAbilityData.elementalAttackDesc: Gives the attack elemental properties (Fire, Air, Water, or Stone), making it stronger against vulnerable targets. Adds +10 Base Damage if the user already has elemental capability.
kiAbilityData.physicalKiWeaponsDesc: Creates a Ki-forged physical weapon of chosen Quality that vanishes when the Technique ends.
kiAbilityData.projectileWeaponDesc: Allows the Ki Weapon to create fired projectiles with unlimited matching ammo.
kiAbilityData.additionalWeaponDesc: The Ki Weapon Technique can manifest 1 more weapon at once.
kiAbilityData.additionalWeapon3Desc: The Ki Weapon Technique can manifest 2 or 3 more weapons at once.
kiAbilityData.additionalWeapon10Desc: The Ki Weapon Technique can manifest 4 to 10 more weapons at once.
kiAbilityData.additionalWeaponUnlimitedDesc: The Ki Weapon Technique can manifest an unlimited number of additional weapons at once.
kiAbilityData.supernaturalAttackDesc: Turns the attack supernatural, using Energy Attack rules. Only those who can block Energy Attacks can defend.
kiAbilityData.kiAbsorptionDesc: Absorbs part or all of the Ki used in an attack if the defender scores a counterattack-eligible Defense. Captured Ki adds to the user's reserve up to a maximum.
kiAbilityData.trappingDesc: Allows the attack to trap the opponent using a Trapping value instead of Strength or Dexterity, with no penalties applied.
kiAbilityData.spiritTrapDesc: Upgrades Trapping to hold a target spiritually, using Power instead of Strength or Agility for opposing checks.
kiAbilityData.physicalShockDesc: Lets a physical Technique counter an Energy Discharge as if it were a long-distance attack, following Discharge Collision rules.
kiAbilityData.damageResistanceDesc: Creates a temporary Ki barrier granting Armor Type 4 and extra Life Points that take damage before the user's own. These points can't be sacrificed and don't auto-regenerate unless maintained.
kiAbilityData.regeneration100Desc: Restores a set amount 100 of the temporary Life Points each turn if the effect is sustained.
kiAbilityData.regeneration250Desc: Restores a set amount 250 of the temporary Life Points each turn if the effect is sustained.
kiAbilityData.regeneration500Desc: Restores a set amount 500 of the temporary Life Points each turn if the effect is sustained.
kiAbilityData.mirageDesc: Creates illusory copies of the user that can mimic actions and attacks. Those who can see through illusions or detect energy recognize them as fake.
kiAbilityData.nonDetectionDesc: (Non-Detection) Makes mirages harder to detect, requiring a detection check against a set difficulty level.
kiAbilityData.changeAppearanceDesc: Allows mirages to take on entirely different forms, even nonhuman ones, up to 10x larger or smaller than the user.
kiAbilityData.phantasmalDesc: Mirages can inflict Fictitious Damage unless targets pass a PsR check; those who realize they are illusions are unaffected.
kiAbilityData.energyShieldDesc: Creates a shield that uses the user's Block or Dodge for defense and absorbs damage with temporary Life Points. It boosts all defenses while active but doesn't heal lost Life Points.
kiAbilityData.supernaturalStatesDesc: Links a supernatural effect to an offensive Technique, forcing targets to pass a Physical Resistance check or suffer a chosen state. The user defines the inflicted state, conditions, and possible area of effect during Technique creation.
kiAbilityData.minorActionPenaltyDesc: Applies a penalty to all Actions equal to the failed PhR amount; recovers 5/turn.
kiAbilityData.greaterActionPenaltyDesc: Applies a penalty to all Actions equal to the failed PhR amount; recovers 5/hour.
kiAbilityData.blindnessDesc: Target loses sight for 1 hour per 10 PhR points failed (minutes if less than 10).
kiAbilityData.charRedOneDesc: Reduces one chosen Characteristic by 1 per 10 PhR points failed; recovers 1/hour.
kiAbilityData.charRedAllDesc: Reduces all Characteristics by 1 per 10 PhR points failed; recovers 1/hour.
kiAbilityData.damageDesc: Target loses Life Points equal to the PhR failure amount.
kiAbilityData.doubleDamageDesc: Target loses double the Life Points equal to the PhR failure amount.
kiAbilityData.phrReductionDesc: Lowers target's PhR by the amount failed, recovering 5/hour.
kiAbilityData.psrReductionDesc: Lowers target's PsyR by the amount failed, recovering 5/hour.
kiAbilityData.fascinationDesc: Target is conscious but unable to act, hypnotized for minutes equal to failure amount.
kiAbilityData.partialParalysisDesc: Target is partially paralyzed for turns equal to failure amount.
kiAbilityData.painDesc: Inflicts terrible pain for minutes equal to failure amount; -40 penalty.
kiAbilityData.extremePainDesc: Inflicts extreme pain for minutes equal to failure amount; -80 penalty.
kiAbilityData.drainKiDesc: Drains Ki equal to failure amount and transfers it to attacker (up to attacker's reserve) (2nd/3rd Ki Tech level only).
kiAbilityData.illusionDesc: Alters one perception for minutes equal to failure amount; can be resisted if suspected.
kiAbilityData.greaterIllusionDesc: Alters any perception for minutes equal to failure amount, can be resisted if suspected.
kiAbilityData.phantasmalIllusionDesc: Alters any perception for minutes equal to failure amount, but follows Phantasm rules and can cause Fictitious Damage.
kiAbilityData.comaDesc: Target is unconscious for 1 hour per PhR point failed; only for 2nd/3rd level Techniques (2nd/3rd Ki Tech level only).
kiAbilityData.controlDesc: Target obeys user for an hour per 10 PhR failed; PsyR check required for forced harmful actions (2nd/3rd level only).
kiAbilityData.drainLifeDesc: Inflicts extra damage equal to failure and heals attacker that amount (2nd/3rd Ki Tech level only).
kiAbilityData.totalParalysisDesc: Completely paralyzes target (2nd/3rd Ki Tech level only).
kiAbilityData.unconsciousnessDesc: Target is knocked out for an hour per 10 PhR failed (minutes if less than 10) (2nd/3rd Ki Tech level only).
kiAbilityData.deathDesc: Kills the target outright on PhR failure (3rd level only).
kiAbilityData.attackDesc: The default condition; requires the user to successfully hit with an attack for the effect to apply.
kiAbilityData.kissDesc: Requires lip-to-lip or similar intimate contact; grants a -120 Attack penalty when trying in combat.
kiAbilityData.physicalContactDesc: Requires any physical touch to activate the effect, even through clothing or armor.
kiAbilityData.mutualVisualDesc: Triggers when the user and target make eye contact; no roll required for the condition.
kiAbilityData.visualOneDesc: Requires the user to see the target clearly; no roll required unless sight is unclear.
kiAbilityData.visualSeveralDesc: Affects all visible targets; functions like single-target visual contact but covers everyone seen.
kiAbilityData.inhaledDesc: The effect travels through air and applies to anyone who breathes it in.
kiAbilityData.heardOneDesc: Requires the target to hear the user emit a sound (speaking, singing, shouting, etc.).
kiAbilityData.heardSeveralDesc: Affects all who can hear the user; functions like single-target hearing but covers everyone who hears.
kiAbilityData.alongGroundDesc: The effect spreads along the ground, affecting anyone in contact with it.
kiAbilityData.alongGroundImprovedDesc: Functions like Along the Ground, but spreads across elevated surfaces like walls, chairs, or ceilings.
kiAbilityData.rangeOfEffectDesc: Specifies how far a Predetermined Condition can extend when triggering a Supernatural State. The chosen range determines who within that distance is affected.
kiAbilityData.impactDesc: The attack hurls the enemy back if it overcomes their Defense; the farther they fail their Strength check, the farther they're thrown.
kiAbilityData.attractDesc: Instead of knocking the target away, the Technique pulls them toward the user if they fail the check.
kiAbilityData.interruptionDesc: Lets the user stop Techniques, Spells, or Psychic Powers the target is sustaining, forcing a PhR check to resist.
kiAbilityData.interruptKiDesc: The Technique interrupts Ki Techniques. When more than one interruption is chosen, only one PhR check is needed for all interruption attempts.
kiAbilityData.interruptMagicDesc: The Technique interrupts Magic Spells. When more than one interruption is chosen, only one PhR check is needed for all interruption attempts.
kiAbilityData.interruptPsychicDesc: The Technique interrupts Psychic Powers. When more than one interruption is chosen, only one PhR check is needed for all interruption attempts.
kiAbilityData.brandDesc: Marks an enemy on a successful attack, giving the user a bonus to hit them for an hour (only the best Brand applies if multiple are set).
kiAbilityData.extendDurationProlongedDesc: The Technique's effects last for a month.
kiAbilityData.extendDurationEternalDesc: The Technique's effects last indefinitely, until the user perishes
kiAbilityData.intangibilityDesc: The character and their belongings become intangible, able to pass through objects and ignore normal attacks, though they are expelled if they stop maintaining the effect.
kiAbilityData.affectOthersDesc: Allows the user to make others intangible alongside them as long as the total amount of presence does not exceed his own.
kiAbilityData.extendedPresenceDesc: Allows the user to make others intangible alongside them, as long as the total amount of presence does not exceed five times his own.
kiAbilityData.fusionDesc: Lets the user partially manifest inside other beings or objects, causing critical internal damage but risking harm to themselves.
kiAbilityData.criticalEnhancementSingleDesc: Adds a bonus to rolls for calculating Critical levels on attacks, but only for one attack per turn. If critical exceed 200, the additional points are halved.
kiAbilityData.automaticCriticalDesc: Any hit with the Technique causes an automatic Critical, regardless of damage dealt.
kiAbilityData.criticalEnhancementMultipleDesc: Adds a bonus to rolls for calculating critical levels on all attacks in the turn, even those with additional weapons (if combinable).
kiAbilityData.attackMirroringDesc: Reflects an opponent's attack back on them using their own roll and stats, treated as a counterattack.
kiAbilityData.mirrorEsotericDesc: The mirrored attack also copies all special properties, even magical or psychic ones.
kiAbilityData.exhaustionDesc: The Technique drains the user, causing them to lose Fatigue when executed. This cost is separate from normal action limits, and the Untiring advantage prevents using this disadvantage.
kiAbilityData.elementalBindingDesc: The Technique is tied to one or two elements, restricting its effects. Higher-level Techniques in the same tree must share this restriction.
kiAbilityData.specializedAttackDesc: The Technique only works against a certain kind of defense (e.g., only against Blocks). It counts as a normal attack otherwise.
kiAbilityData.tiedToWeaponDesc: The Technique requires a specific weapon or weapon type to be used. If the weapon isn't equipped, the Technique fails.
kiAbilityData.limitedCircumstanceDesc: The Technique only works under specific predefined conditions. If those conditions aren't met, it cannot be used.
kiAbilityData.combatCircumstanceDesc: The Technique only works when the target is in a certain state (e.g., knocked down, from behind). Multiple circumstances can be combined for greater restriction.
kiAbilityData.complexDesc: The Technique is hard to control, increasing the user's Fumble chance by 2. This makes failures more likely when using the Technique.
kiAbilityData.conditionsDesc: The Technique requires specific conditions to activate. Multiple conditions can be combined if they're not inherently linked.
kiAbilityData.reducedDamageDesc: The Technique deals reduced or no damage. Only applies to Attack or Counterattack effects.
kiAbilityData.specializedDefenseDesc: The Technique only defends against one type of attack. Only one specialization can be chosen per Defense.
kiAbilityData.exterminatorDesc: The Technique only works on certain creatures or entities. Against others, it's just a normal attack.
kiAbilityData.excessiveEnergyUseDesc: The Technique burns extra Ki, draining an amount equal to its original cost when used.
kiAbilityData.weaponLossDesc: The Technique destroys the weapon it's used with (or injures the user for 100 LP if the weapon resists).
kiAbilityData.actionPenaltyDesc: Using the Technique weakens the user, giving penalties to all actions afterward. This penalty fades at 10 points per turn.
kiAbilityData.predeterminationDesc: The Technique must be declared for use at least one turn in advance.
kiAbilityData.advancePreparationDesc: The Technique requires time to prepare (1 minute to 1 day). Without this prep, the Technique can't be used.
kiAbilityData.elementalRequirementsDesc: The Technique can only be used when near a required elemental intensity. Lesser needs 2, Greater needs 8 or more.
kiAbilityData.vitalSacrificeDisvDesc: The Technique costs Life Points to use, all Life Points used this way count as a Sacrifice.
kiAbilityData.characteristicSacrificeDisvDesc: The Technique permanently drains 1 point from a chosen Characteristic every time it's used.
kiAbilityData.defenselessDesc: Using the Technique leaves the character completely unable to defend that turn. Cannot be combined with Full Attack or used by Damage Resistance creatures.
kiAbilityData.overloadDesc: The Technique overloads the user's Ki, preventing any Ki Techniques for 5-20 turns afterward.
kiAbilityData.finalTechniqueDesc: The Technique destroys the user's Ki permanently after one use, making them unable to use Ki again.
kiAbilityData.maintainedTechniqueDesc: The Technique can only be used while another specific Technique is being maintained. The MK reduction depends on that maintained Technique's level.
kiAbilityData.limitedUsesDesc: The Technique can only be used a set number of times in the user's life. Once the limit is reached, it's gone forever.

dialogs.noActor: The target token does not have an actor associated with it
dialogs.mustTarget: Must have at least one target selected
dialogs.noMultiSelect: Must have only one token selected as an attacker
dialogs.noSelectToken: Must have one token selected as an attacker
dialogs.aoeAttack: You have initiated an AOE attack which has not been implemented yet

settingsTab.tempWip: [Right click -> Edit to change class info]

globalSettings.spiritDetail: Turns on Homebrew Spirit Damage, requires refresh (f5) to take effect. This homebrew is my own(Luminita).
globalSettings.fumbleDetail: Switches the method fumbles are calculated away from the core book and instead uses the core exxet correction. This means that all rolls under the fumble range are failures and a 1d100 is rolled to calculate the degree of failure.
globalSettings.meterDetail: Switches the movement calculation from feet to meters, requires refresh (f5) to take effect.
globalSettings.changeThemeDetails: Changes the color theme for everything to a light version, requires refresh (f5) to take effect.
globalSettings.openRollNameDetails: When enabled, changes the open roll logic to follow the official logic. If disabled, Open Roll dice must be higher than the prior dice; rather than merely the Threshold + 1
globalSettings.openRollInitiative: Allow Initiative Rolls to Open Roll
globalSettings.openRollInitiativeDetails: When enabled, allows all initiative rolls to open roll automatically. These open rolls follow either core open roll rules or Lumi's open roll rules based on the setting above.

monsterPowers.replaceChar: Replace base char w/ monster char?
